dict.acceptation: 错误，过失，误解；差错，口误，笔误；失策，失误；

sent.orig: Don't be afraid of mistake. The biggest mistake is you don't want to make mistake.
sent.trans: 不要惧怕犯错误。最大的错误就是想着不能犯错。

sent.orig: A mistake is a mistake. Don't try to explain it away.
A common mistake is where both parties are mistaken and they make the same mistake.
sent.trans: 共同误解是指双方都产生了误解，并且产生了相同的误解。

sent.orig: If beautiful is a mistake, i" d rather make mistake again. "
sent.trans: 如果长得帅也是一种错，我宁愿一错再错。

sent.orig: The only mistake is not to learn from a mistake.
sent.trans: 唯一的错误就是不能从错误中吸取教训。
